prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon that has a sleek, futuristic design with vibrant colors.
I want a Pokemon that embodies the concept of space and time, with unique body features.
Generate a legendary Pokemon with a striking orange body and blue accents that looks otherworldly.
Make a Pokemon that represents intelligence and speed, featuring sharp, angular shapes.
Imagine a powerful psychic creature with long, flowing appendages and an ethereal presence.
Design a Pokemon with an alien vibe, combining orange and blue in a mesmerizing way.
Show me a unique Pokemon that blends technology and biology in its appearance.
